definition.para: A location, usually a city, associated with the publisher of the resource.

customization.para: Search for the publisher's geographic location in the Library of Congress Name Authority File via id.loc.gov.
If a match is found, copy the name string for use just as it appears at the top of the page, above the URI(s). Include any parenthesis following the location name.
If no record exists, use the most universal spelling of the location.
If multiple publishers are associated with a resource, include the Publisher value to which the location applies in square brackets ("[" and "]") following this value.
If entering multiple values for this property, separate each using a semicolon and space (“; “). Order of values does not matter.
